item.description: *Severe headache,° with deep red eyes and dry lips.

item.title: Remaining Task List Deductions
item.description: 1. Testing Individual upgrade of symptoms from comparison final view display list. Trigerred with edit icon from the comparison final view page.

item.title: Symcom Developer Home
item.description: Symcom Developer Guide Getting Started: Welcome to the Symcom Developer Guide! If you’re looking for information on individual topics, please follow the contents or topics from the side bar navigation.

item.title: Actualization of date and time
item.description: general Whenever any actions are taken in the comparison page like connect, paste, connect edit, paste edit, comment/footnote/ non secure/ marking operations etc.

item.title: All Connection Business Logic
item.description: comparison For ongoing connection: Comparing symptom after connect, further connect can be done with that symptom appearing under other initials.

item.title: Allen Source Import
item.description: import Allen Sources are special sources where symptoms have references linked to it.

item.title: Automatic Symptom Connection Process
item.description: comparison This process is available in the comparison process where an editor can choose to connect the highest matched comparative with the initial symptoms choosing a minimum percentage as lower limit for the automatic connection.

item.title: Basic Rules relating to connection of symptoms in comparison page
item.description: comparison PASTE EDIT RULES Rule 1 : Paste Editing a Comparative Symptom in some section, will not change the same Comparative Symptom and Percentage in other sections.

item.title: Bönninghausen Sources
item.description: import Background: Bonninghausen is a special sources where symptoms are of different format in the original document.
